title: A Seed of Doubt
goal: Lyra begins to question the Conclave's leadership and Valerius's true intentions, aligning more firmly with Kaelen.

beats.summary: Lyra, observing Valerius's increasingly bold actions and calculated rhetoric, begins to notice subtle inconsistencies in his motives and arguments.
She witnesses his manipulative tactics firsthand, realizing his ambition might outweigh his loyalty to the Conclave's true purpose.
In a private, hushed conversation, Lyra voices her growing concerns and suspicions about Valerius to Kaelen, seeking his ancient insight.
Kaelen, confirming her fears, shares his own subtle, long-held suspicions about Valerius, reinforcing Lyra's conviction.
